tool_description: Find the NAICS code based on free search or find all descriptions of industry for a given NAICS code.

api_list.name: Filter and Query NAICS & Description
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search by freeform text (e.g., 'Hotel') and retrieve a list of NAICS codes, hashes, and descriptions. You can also filter the search using a specific NAICS code to get the corresponding description and hash of the industry.

optional_parameters.name: naics
optional_parameters.description: This parameter accepts a full 6-digit NAICS code. It is optional if the 'q' parameter is present.

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: When performing a freeform search without the NAICS parameter, a minimum of 3 characters is required to search. It is optional if the NAICS parameter is present.
